column1: '''''Tyalië Tyelelliéva''''' is a journal on Tolkienian linguistics edited by [[Lisa Star]] since [[1994]]. It publishes poems and other texts in the Elvish languages as well as articles about the languages and alphabets of [[Middle-earth]].
It appeared three to four times per year at first
column5: before the current hiatus in publication began in December [[2001]]. How long this hiatus will last is unknown - no-one seems to be able to contact her<ref>Matthew "Tyrhael" Dinse
column7: ''[[Elfling]]''</ref> - but the official website received an update in March [[2009]].
